casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Charles Grant BYRD, Jr., No. D-2988. Supreme Court of the United States June 12, 2017. Charles Grant Byrd, Jr., of Baltimore, Maryland, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
